title: Jan. 6 Committee Issues 10 More Subpoenas
sub_head: Panel seeks depositions from Kayleigh McEnany, Stephen Miller and other former Trump aides
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The House select committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol has issued subpoenas to 10 former Trump administration officials, including former White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany and senior adviser Stephen Miller.
The committee is seeking depositions and records from the aides to former President Donald Trump, with deadlines later this month and next month.
